question:
The company you work has decided to close the cafeteria, as the staff is not using it much. You are not happy with the decision. Write a letter to the director 
Give reason of low use
How it will affect the staff
Suggest ways to improve it
text: I am writing to let you know that mw and another employes received cafeteria  closing notice yesterday. I know we are not using it much more. But no one is happy after getting this news.

Let me explain situation, most of the staff members are ignoring cafeteria because of the unproper cleaning. Even most of the chairs are already broken over there and some times coffee machine is also not working. Due to this reason in break time we are going outside for coffee. Moreover cefeteria is our only place of relaxtion, where we can meet with eachother and reducing our stress.

Would you kindly think about again on company's decision please. Because if company fixup seating areegement and focus on cleaning of cafeteria then defectenely everyone will come in this area regulary. Everyone like this area very much, because it is the place where coworkers can improve their strong bonding with eachother.
